one_reviews_text: @Everybody who made this app possible: thank you!

thank you for your answer and the update amazing i hope you will upload the others parts too it is really incredible   the models ,the voices, the landscape in vr  great by the way
 it is not possible to access to your site anymore

review_title: I took a photo of a penguin (shrug)
one_reviews_text: This free experience lets you spend a few minutes in the snow being told about penguins and the challenges they are facing.  The IK of my hands and body was a bit weird.  Scanned some penguins, photographed a penguin.  Quit out never to return.  Not bad per se, just not compelling either.

Nice work with the models and the content, the only problem is that after taking the picture of a penguin and hearing the explanation, nothing else happens, I don't know if that is the end of the experience or if it is a bug. Keep the good work. I will love more apps like this.
review_feedback:
Thank you for the feedback aleks_arias! Yes, that is the end of the Antarctica experience. We have updated the app so that it will take you back to the menu screen once completed.
Thanks

one_reviews_text: After choosing only possible experience black screen and nothing happens. Great job!
review_feedback: Hi GrimPilgrim, thank you for the feedback. We have just updated the application to work with the newest version of Oculus. We encourage you to update the app and try the full experience.

one_reviews_text: Nothing but a black screen. Too bad.
review_feedback: Hi toddeklof, we have just updated the application to work with the newest version of Oculus. We hope you have time to update the app and try the full experience.

one_reviews_text: This app lets you experience what it's like for scientists to work in Antarctica. Looking forward to more content from this developer!
